|action2=FAC |action2date=2015-03-12 |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Forest raven/archive1 |action2result=promoted |action2oldid=650402084 }}
{{WikiProject Birds|importance=low|class = FA|needs-photo=no}} {{WikiProject Australia|class = FA|importance=Low}}
==Untitled== HANZAB doesn't mention the Relict Raven, so I assume that the elevation to species status has been rescinded. Unfortunately volume 7 has not been published yet, so I can't look it up. The latest Australian field guide I have lists it as a subspecies: ''Corvus tasmanicus boreus''. Any further information would be of interest.
Nice work on the raven articles, by the way. [[User:Tannin|Tannin]]
I would like to get comments from other users but I do not believe Forest Raven ever has white spots on the wings and tail. Also the illustration of the bird with white spots is NOT Forest Raven but Black Currawong (Strepera fuliginosa).
The distribution section is incomplete as this species also occurs patchily in South Australia.
[[User:The sanguine vulture|The sanguine vulture]] ([[User talk:The sanguine vulture|talk]]) 02:19, 21 April 2011 (UTC)
:Thanks! now removed. [[User:Casliber|Casliber]] ([[User talk:Casliber|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Casliber|contribs]]) 08:28, 9 May 2011 (UTC)

== Note from Graeme Chapman ==
Note to self (from email from Graeme Chapman bit below) - need to chase refs which support the following....cool.....[[User:Casliber|Cas Liber]] ([[User talk:Casliber|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Casliber|contribs]]) 08:15, 30 August 2014 (UTC)
"Vaurie (1962a) disposed of it by selecting it as a junior homonym of Corvus australis Gmelin, 1788 (p.377) = Monasa atra (Boddaert, 1783) Bucconidae - action of first reviser under ICZN Art. 24."
== For checking ==
*[http://search.informit.com.au/documentSummary;dn=858272903243568;res=IELHSS] and [http://search.informit.com.au/documentSummary;dn=307717241352204;res=IELHSS] [[User:Casliber|Cas Liber]] ([[User talk:Casliber|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Casliber|contribs]]) 05:43, 27 January 2015 (UTC)
{{Talk:Forest raven/GA1}}
== Clarification needed, prose needs copyediting. ==
* "Birds breed later in Tasmania than mainland Australia, though that species has been little-studied. " Which species? ::<font color="purple">hmmm, didn't think I put "that" in the beginning, but "the" as just means the forest raven - was reluctant to write "forest raven" as it sound a bit repetitive after the previous sentence</font> [[User:Casliber|Cas Liber]] ([[User talk:Casliber|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Casliber|contribs]]) 09:55, 27 March 2015 (UTC) * "Eggs have been recorded from July to September and nestlings in September and October in New South Wales, and nestlings have been noted from September to December in Victoria" -- run on sentence. ::<font color="purple">changed to "while" as slighlty contrastive</font> [[User:Casliber|Cas Liber]] ([[User talk:Casliber|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Casliber|contribs]]) 09:55, 27 March 2015 (UTC) * I'll try to get to these myself later. Sorry I missed this at FA. --[[User:Gaff|Gaff]] ([[User talk:Gaff|talk]]) 04:46, 27 March 2015 (UTC)
